package.name: Esetroot
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.patch:
cat << EOF > patch --- Esetroot-20030422.orig/Makefile 2004-09-17 01:37:48.000000000 +0000 +++ Esetroot-20030422/Makefile 2014-01-14 11:55:32.318143667 +0000 @@ -1,5 +1,5 @@ IMLIB_CFLAGS = \$(shell imlib2-config --cflags) -IMLIB_LIBS = \$(shell imlib2-config --libs) +IMLIB_LIBS = -L/usr/lib -lImlib2 -ldl -lX11 DEFINES = -DPIXMAP_SUPPORT -DHAVE_UNISTD_H
VERSION = 20030422
EOF cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} cat ../patch | patch -p1
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin install -m 0755 Esetroot ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin ln -s Esetroot ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/esetroot
